title: Can a person change his intention / niyyah during prayer from fard to sunnah? Assim al hakeem
transcript: ahmed from egypt he says can i change my knee my intention if i was in prayer from fard to sunnah if i figure out while praying the for prayer that i did not pray the sunnah that is prior to it this is not permissible because this is not a valid reason you can finish your fart and afterwards pray the four rakah before duhr as qaddaf and then pray the two raka's after and allah knows best muhammad
